                RELEASE NOTES:
                
                This is a LAN edition patch I repeat its still NOT for playing omline!!!!!!

                The admin menu is opened by pressing F3 ingame for everyone so if your
                hosting your game first change the password in admins.txt and your password
                in your autoexec.cfg so you will be the only admin


                .:................................................................................:.

                ADDITIONAL FEATURES:

                - Includes all currently released textures needed for the maps
                - some game scripts
                - Professional installer
                - Admin menu (just press F3)
                - custom GUI
                - A 4 min install
                - Updated from 1.0.1.9 to 1.0.2.0
